module.name: term/properties
module.description: This module contains strategies for checking local structural properties on terms.
module.author: Eelco Visser <visser@acm.org>
Karl Trygve Kalleberg <karltk@strategoxt.org> - documentation

strategy.name: is-subterm
strategy.description:
Succeeds if the first argument is a subterm of the second.
A term x is a subterm of a term y if x = y or if x is a subterm of one of the chuldren of y.

strategy.name: is-proper-subterm
strategy.description: Succeeds if the first argument (x) is a subterm of the second (y) and x is not y.

strategy.name: is-superterm
strategy.description: Succeeds if the first argument (x) is a superterm of the second (y).

strategy.name: is-proper-superterm
strategy.description: Succeeds if the first argument (x) is a superterm of the second (y) and x is not y.

strategy.name: is-leaf
strategy.description: Succeeds if the current term has no direct subterms.

strategy.name: is-inner-node
strategy.description: Succeeds if the current term has at least one direct subterm.
